name: Raid Bezos (Unreality)
description:
THE GAME

The day before Christmas is always a stressful moment for everyone in the North Pole… yet today is even worse than usual : Big Corporations have come to enslave Santa’s elves ! You got to protect Christmas magic at all cost.

You are the Security General of the North Pole (an elve) and must stop the Big Corpo goons from enslaving every worker in the North Pole ! Santa is out of town preparing for Christmas and you are the only one who can protect the workforce, the gifts and save the day. Fortunately for you, Santa always leaves some “special gifts” in case of emergency, but their content is hidden until you unpack them. Christmas magic !

FEATURES

- Defend Santa's gifts and home - Big Corporations want to take over his operation! - Shoot high-speed and explosive snowballs - Survive all the enemy waves who are ready to attack!

TEAM

Game Design:
Timothé COURTIER Antoine PERSON Nathan RENAUD

Game Programming:
Nam MIRBEAU-BAUDIN Nicolas VALADOU Vincent BOUTIN Jules FRITZ

Game Art:
Etienne NEMIEC Tamara DIMOVSKI

Sound Design
Antoine PERSON Timothé COURTIER

Producing
Tristan SOLARO

This game was developped in 72 hours for the CHRISTMAS UNREAL JAM 2020

COMMANDS:

Mouse:

Left click : shoot
Right click : Put a Trap (if you got any)
Scroll up : Riffle Gun
Scroll down : Explosive Gun

KeyBoard:

ZQSD : Move
E : if near the gift reserve : Take a trap (5 max)
       if near the ammo box : Munitions max
